mapper.sql: id, company_id, company_name, sum, paid, member_num, state, create_time, update_time
mapper.select:
select
from company_bill
1=1
and id = #{id}
and company_name like concat('%',#{companyName},'%')
and state = #{state}
ORDER BY create_time DESC
mapper.insert:
insert into company_bill
id,
company_id,
company_name,
sum,
paid,
member_num,
state,
create_time, update_time,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{companyId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{sum,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{paid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{memberNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
now(), now(),
mapper.update:
update company_bill
company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
company_name = #{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sum = #{sum,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
paid = #{paid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
member_num = #{memberNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
state = #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_time = now(),
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update company_bill set company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, company_name = #{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sum = #{sum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, paid = #{paid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, member_num = #{memberNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, state = #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
